description.ko: 주파수의 숨겨진 구조를 보여주며, 물리적 물질로 나타나는 음파의 시각화입니다.
description.en: A visualization of sound waves manifesting as physical matter, showing the hidden architecture of frequencies.

prompt: A sphere of liquid sapphire #4169E1 suspended in a silent void, reacting to a powerful low-frequency soundwave by erupting into sharp architectural spikes. Minimalist lines in #FF4500 and #FFD700 intersect the form, visualizing soundwaves through vibrating frequencies. 8k, Octane Render, raytracing, high-speed motion blur on the edges of the #32CD32 liquid metal, capturing the visual consonance of resonance.
